00058 GUIGLObjectPopupMenu*
00059 GUIDetectorWrapper::getPopUpMenu(GUIMainWindow& app,
00060                                  GUISUMOAbstractView& parent) {
00061     GUIGLObjectPopupMenu* ret = new GUIGLObjectPopupMenu(app, parent, *this);
00062     buildPopupHeader(ret, app);
00063     buildCenterPopupEntry(ret);
00064     buildNameCopyPopupEntry(ret);
00065     buildSelectionPopupEntry(ret);
00066     buildShowParamsPopupEntry(ret);
00067     buildPositionCopyEntry(ret, false);
00068     return ret;
00069 }
